CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in these data.

u.a: CHI and MOT and INV enter the room . INV tells MOT about the warm-up task
INV leaves and MOT closes the door
CHI is focussing her attention on the jack+in+the+box on the floor
MOT kneels on floor next to CHI
CHI nods and moves away from the jack+in+the+box
MOT is pointing at the jack+in+the+box
CHI is moving further away from the jack+in+the+box
CHI points to object on the floor
MOT pulls CHI to her side and turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box until it pops at 09:21:17
MOT puts clown back inside the jack+in+the+box and pushes it to the other side of the room
CHI nods her head and points at the jack+in+the+box
MOT motions to the book on the floor with her hand
<bef> CHI takes a few steps in the direction of the book
MOT picks up the jack+in+the+box and moves it to the other side of the room
MOT motions towards the book again
<bef> CHI walks towards the book and then stops
<bef> CHI takes a step forwards and then turns to hug MOT
<aft> MOT moves ball to the side and points to the book
CHI takes three steps and goes back to MOT
MOT waves her hand in the air
MOT turns CHI around towards book
CHI points and walks towards the book
<bef> MOT turns CHI around and pushes her towards the book
CHI gives MOT the book and walks past her
CHI is pointing at the desk
CHI keeps looking at the doll on the desk
MOT sits in the chair and shows the cover of the book to CHI
CHI points to cover of book
MOT points to the cover of the book
MOT runs her finger across the page
<aft> MOT nods then points to the page
CHI stares blankly at the page
INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place and reenters at 09:31:28
INV explains the forbidden object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV removes the toys on the table and leaves the string of beads there for CHI to play with
INV takes out object and places it on table and then sets it in motion
CHI watches object move and slightly moves her hand . CHI looks at MOT
CHI lightly places both hands on the front of her dress
CHI looks at INV and smiles softly as she watches the object
noise of disappointment that the object was put away
<aft> CHI follows object into drawer by waving her hand through the air
<aft> MOT raises her hand reinforcing her words
Mother touches the string of beads on the table
INV explains to MOT about the four Parent Child Interaction boxes . MOT takes CHI out of the chair
MOT holds CHI up to mirror
MOT turns and looks at the door
MOT moves chair next to them
MOT puts down CHI and they both walk to desk
MOT is standing in front of CHI with a box
CHI goes right to the box and puts her hands inside
MOT puts the box on the floor and crouches behind it
CHI stares blankly at MOT . CHI starts looking around the room
MOT takes ball out of box
<aft> MOT moves box out of the way and she kneels directly across from CHI with the ball in her hands
CHI takes the ball from MOT's hands and throws the ball on a chair in room
CHI gets the ball off the chair
MOT moves box across room with ball in her other hand
CHI starts walking towards the door
CHI turns away from MOT and back towards the desk
<aft> CHI reaches into MOT's bag under chair and takes paper bag out
CHI moves back and forth restlessly
CHI walks behind MOT over to door
MOT crosses the room to get ball and then rolls ball on floor then holds it out for CHI
MOT puts ball in the box and moves across to the desk where she picks up the other boxes
MOT walks across the room and sits in the floor
MOT takes the cover off the box
CHI keeps her eyes fixed on the box while still eating a cookie
MOT takes the cloth out of the box and holds it up
CHI stares at cloth and points
<bef> MOT lifts up cloth then lowers it
MOT holds cloth up in front of CHI
CHI pushes it away with her hand
CHI turns around the other way and starts climbing into chair . Her attention is still on MOT
<bef> MOT holds the cloth in front of herself and lowers it very slowly
CHI turns towards the chair and then back towards MOT
<bef> MOT turns cloth lengthwise so she covers more of herself and pops her head out the side
<bef> MOT repeats the procedure this time sticking her head out the other side
<bef> CHI turns around and tries to get into MOT's bag again . CHI pulls out bag that has cookies in it and walks to MOT
CHI nods then shakes her head no
MOT puts the towel in the box and starts to open bag of cookies
CHI comes over and reaches in bag of cookies
MOT pulls bag and takes out cookies
MOT puts one cookie on the table and the rest back in the bag
CHI turns around to face MOT
MOT holds up cloth in front of herself facing the table
CHI turns around and grabs at cloth
CHI turns towards the table and then back to MOT
holds cloth in front of CHI
MOT mimics intonation of CHI's last utterance
MOT puts the cloth away in the box
<aft> MOT picks up another box and shakes it . MOT moves over to the table and helps CHI turn around so that she is sitting facing the table . MOT places the box on the table
CHI focuses her attention on the box
MOT reaches her arms around CHI and starts to open the box
CHI grabs the cookie off the table and starts eating it
CHI is staring at the box
MOT reaches into the box . MOT picks up a paper and starts reading it
MOT takes out one piece of paper and the crayons out of the box and places them in front of CHI
CHI puts the cookie down next to the crayons and gets up from the chair
MOT turns around to watch CHI
CHI walks around in back of MOT and goes to the cookie bag
MOT picks up the cookie on the table then replaces it
<bef> MOT grabs the bag away from CHI . MOT picks up the cookie shows it to CHI and puts it back on the table
CHI reaches for the cookie bag
MOT grabs the bag and puts it away
CHI drops the bottle on the floor
MOT puts the bag back underneath the chair
CHI points to the door while she drinks
CHI moves her hand as if she is opening the door by the doorknob
MOT picks up CHI and puts her back in the chair
CHI tries to get out of chair
MOT picks up bottle and starts drawing with a crayon
CHI gets out of the chair and starts walking towards the bag with the cookies in it
MOT gets cookies out of bag
CHI points to the doll on the desk
<bef> MOT grabs CHI's arm and gently pulls her back . MOT moves top of box out of CHI's path
CHI goes to get the doll
MOT stands up and gets the doll
<aft> MOT points to the crayons and the paper on the table
MOT hands the doll to CHI
MOT puts the doll on table and seats CHI in the chair . MOT hands CHI a crayon
CHI takes the crayon and starts to draw
CHI continues drawing with the same crayon
CHI picks up a different crayon
MOT moves the other crayons on to the table
CHI picks up a cookie and feeds the doll
CHI nods then goes to pick up a crayon
MOT picks up a crayon and writes along the side of the paper
MOT turns doll around on CHI's lap so that she can hold the doll and draw at the same time
CHI puts both hands on doll's head and stares at paper
MOT starts to pick up crayons and paper
MOT puts the crayons and the paper back in the box
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
MOT gets the last box and puts it on the table
CHI is closely watching the box
MOT opens the box and takes out the book
puts the box on the desk
CHI puts the doll down on the table and opens the book
MOT assembles all of the other boxes on the desk
MOT lowers herself next to CHI
CHI continues to touch her face
MOT takes something off of CHI's face
CHI and MOT both turn to face book that MOT is holding over the table
CHI puts the doll on the table
CHI reaches towards the bag of cookies on the table
MOT turns the page and watches CHI closely
CHI takes a cookie and pushes the doll away from her
MOT gently takes the doll from CHI and sits the doll on the table
CHI looks at the page intently
MOT points to page when she pauses then runs her finger across it to indicate motion
CHI pushes a cookie at the doll
CHI feeds the doll then feeds herself
CHI's attention is on the book
CHI takes a bite of her cookie and then puts it on the table
<$=1> MOT runs her finger along the page
MOT points to the pages with her finger
CHI moves her legs up and down excitedly
every time MOT pauses she runs her finger along the animal that she is speaking about
CHI grabs the book and opens the cover
